statements: SELECT * FROM Warehouse_Capacity_Utilization;
SELECT Warehouse_ID, Storage_Area, Max_Capacity FROM Warehouse_Capacity_Utilization;
SELECT Current_Inventory, Warehouse_ID, Layout_Type FROM Warehouse_Capacity_Utilization ORDER BY Current_Inventory DESC;
SELECT Storage_Area, Warehouse_ID, Layout_Type FROM Warehouse_Capacity_Utilization WHERE Max_Capacity > 1000;
SELECT Warehouse_ID, Max_Capacity, Current_Inventory FROM Warehouse_Capacity_Utilization WHERE Warehouse_ID = 3;
SELECT * FROM Warehouse_Capacity_Utilization
SELECT Warehouse_ID, Storage_Area, Max_Capacity FROM Warehouse_Capacity_Utilization ORDER BY Max_Capacity DESC
SELECT Warehouse_ID, Storage_Area, Layout_Type FROM Warehouse_Capacity_Utilization WHERE Current_Inventory < Max_Capacity
SELECT * FROM Warehouse_Capacity_Utilization WHERE Layout_Type = 'Pallet Racking' OR Layout_Type = 'Shelving'
SELECT Warehouse_ID, Storage_Area, Current_Inventory FROM Warehouse_Capacity_Utilization WHERE Current_Inventory < 100
SELECT * FROM WarehouseCapacityUtilization
SELECT warehouse_id, total_capacity FROM WarehouseCapacityUtilization ORDER BY warehouse_id DESC
SELECT warehouse_id, total_capacity, used_capacity FROM WarehouseCapacityUtilization WHERE used_capacity > 0.5
SELECT * FROM StorageLayout
SELECT shelf_id, items_count FROM StorageLayout ORDER BY items_count DESC
SELECT * FROM WarehouseCapacityUtilization WHERE warehouse_id = 2;
SELECT warehouse_id, total_capacity, used_capacity FROM WarehouseCapacityUtilization WHERE total_capacity > 1000;
SELECT shelf_id, items_count, shelf_capacity FROM StorageLayout WHERE items_count < 10 ORDER BY shelf_capacity DESC;
SELECT warehouse_id, SUM(total_capacity) AS total_capacity_sum FROM WarehouseCapacityUtilization GROUP BY warehouse_id;
SELECT warehouse_id, MAX(used_capacity) AS max_used_capacity FROM WarehouseCapacityUtilization;
SELECT * FROM warehouse_capacity;
SELECT capacity, warehouse_id FROM warehouse_capacity;
SELECT space_id, warehouse_id, capacity_utilization FROM storage_space ORDER BY space_id DESC;
SELECT layout_type FROM layout_optimization WHERE space_id IN (1, 2, 3);
SELECT warehouse_id, SUM(capacity) AS total_capacity FROM warehouse_capacity GROUP BY warehouse_id HAVING total_capacity > 1000;
SELECT * FROM warehouse_capacity WHERE capacity > 100 ORDER BY warehouse_id DESC;
SELECT warehouse_id, capacity FROM warehouse_capacity JOIN storage_space ON warehouse_capacity.warehouse_id = storage_space.warehouse_id WHERE capacity_utilization < 0.5;
SELECT space_id, warehouse_id, capacity_utilization FROM storage_space WHERE space_id BETWEEN 10 AND 20;
SELECT warehouse_id, layout_type FROM warehouse_capacity JOIN layout_optimization ON warehouse_capacity.warehouse_id = layout_optimization.space_id WHERE layout_type = 'efficient';
SELECT COUNT(warehouse_id) AS total_warehouses, AVG(capacity) AS avg_capacity FROM warehouse_capacity;
SELECT * FROM warehouse_capacity;
SELECT product_name, category FROM product ORDER BY category DESC;
SELECT area_name, capacity FROM storage_area WHERE warehouse_id = 2;
SELECT product_name, quantity, timestamp FROM product p JOIN usage_log u ON p.product_id = u.product_id;
SELECT area_name, SUM(quantity) AS total_quantity FROM storage_area s JOIN usage_log u ON s.area_id = u.area_id GROUP BY area_name;
SELECT * FROM product WHERE weight > 5 ORDER BY product_name ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT product_name, category, weight FROM product WHERE category = 'Electronics' ORDER BY weight DESC;
SELECT area_name, capacity, warehouse_id FROM storage_area WHERE capacity < 1000 ORDER BY warehouse_id, capacity;

SELECT product.product_name, storage_area.area_name, usage_log.quantity FROM product JOIN usage_log ON product.product_id = usage_log.product_id JOIN storage_area ON usage_log.area_id = storage_area.area_id WHERE quantity > 20 ORDER BY quantity DESC;
SELECT log_id, area_id, product_id, quantity, timestamp FROM usage_log WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31' ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM warehouse_capacity;
SELECT warehouse_name, warehouse_location FROM warehouse_capacity WHERE warehouse_id = 1;
SELECT item_name, item_quantity FROM item_inventory ORDER BY item_quantity DESC;
SELECT category_name FROM item_categories WHERE category_id BETWEEN 1 AND 3;
SELECT item_name, item_quantity, shelf_number FROM item_inventory JOIN shelf_details ON item_inventory.shelf_id = shelf_details.shelf_id;
SELECT * FROM warehouse_capacity;
SELECT warehouse_name, warehouse_location FROM warehouse_capacity ORDER BY warehouse_location DESC;
SELECT item_name, item_quantity FROM item_inventory WHERE item_quantity > 50;
SELECT warehouse_name, shelf_number, shelf_capacity FROM warehouse_capacity JOIN shelf_details ON warehouse_capacity.warehouse_id = shelf_details.warehouse_id;
SELECT DISTINCT category_name FROM item_categories JOIN item_category_mapping ON item_categories.category_id = item_category_mapping.category_id;
